;Draggable Rural GLR [Groundlightrail] Section
;---------------------------------------------------
;This section uses the "lightrail" network to create draggable Rural GLR.
;Last update: 03-26-07 by memo
;;
;;
;straight GLR - 0x08031500 > 0x5f884000
0x5f884000,1,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,1,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
;
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f880000,1,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f880000,3,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f880000,1,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f880000,3,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
;
;
;diagonal GLR - 0x08001A00 > 0x5f884600
0x5f884600,2,0,0x08001A00,2,0=0x5f884600,2,0,0x5f884600,0,0
0x5f884600,1,0,0x08001A00,1,0=0x5f884600,1,0,0x5f884600,3,0
;
0x5f884600,2,0,0x5f880600,0,0=0x5f884600,2,0,0x5f884600,0,0
0x5f884600,1,0,0x5f880600,3,0=0x5f884600,1,0,0x5f884600,3,0
;
;
;end caps
0x5f884000,1,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884000,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
;diagonal end caps aren't yet completed
0x5f884600,2,0,0x08000200,1,0=0x5f884600,2,0,0x5f884600,0,0
0x5f884600,1,0,0x08000200,3,1=0x5f884600,1,0,0x5f884600,3,0
;
;
;corner - 0x5f882e00 > 0x5f884200
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f882e00,1,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884200,1,0
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f882e00,2,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f884200,2,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f884200,0,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f884200,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884200,0,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f884200,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884200,3,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f884200,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884200,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f884200,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f884200,0,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f884200,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f884200,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f884200,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;T-intersection - 0x5f882f00 > 0x5f885200
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f882f00,1,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885200,1,0
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f882f00,2,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885200,2,0
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f882f00,3,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885200,3,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f885200,0,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f885200,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f885200,0,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f885200,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0

0x5f885200,3,0,0x08031500,3,0=0x5f885200,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
;end caps
0x5f885200,0,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f885200,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f885200,1,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f885200,1,0,0x5f884000,1,0
0x5f885200,3,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f885200,3,0,0x5f884000,1,0
; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
0x5f885200,1,0,0x082E2D00,0,0=0x5f885200,3,0,0x5f885100,0,0
0x5f885200,1,0,0x082E2D00,1,0=0x5f885200,3,0,0x5f885100,1,0
0x5f885200,1,0,0x082E2D00,2,0=0x5f885200,3,0,0x5f885100,2,0
0x5f885200,1,0,0x082E2D00,3,0=0x5f885200,3,0,0x5f885100,3,0
;fix
0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885200,0,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885200,2,0
0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f885200,0,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f885200,2,0
0x08031500,1,0,0x5f885200,0,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885200,2,0
0x08031500,3,0,0x5f885200,0,0=0x5f884000,3,0,0x5f885200,2,0
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;+-intersection - 0x082E2D00 > 0x5f885100

0x5f884000,1,0,0x082E2D00,3,0=0x5f884000,1,0,0x5f885100,3,0
;next to ...
; > straight GLR
0x5f885100,0,0,0x08031500,1,0=0x5f885100,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0

0x5f885100,0,0,0x08000500,1,0=0x5f885100,0,0,0x5f884000,1,0

; > GLR corner
; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad
; > GLRxStreet
; > GLRxOneWayRoad
; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad
; > GLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > GLRxdiagRail
; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;

; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1
; > 2orthx2waydiag1
; > diagjunction
; > orthGRLxdiagGLR
; > piece 297
; > GLRxRoad

; > GLRxRail

; > GLR T-intersection
; > GLR +-intersection
; > orth-diag1
; > orth-2waydiag1
; > 2orthxdiag1

; > diagjunction
; > orthGRLxdiagGLR
; > piece 297

; > GLRxStreet

; > GLRxRail
; > GLRxAvenue
; > GLRxdiagRoad

; > y-intersection
; > diagGLRxRoad
; > diagGLRxOneWayRoad
; > diagGLRxRail
; > diagGLRxAvenue
; > diagGLRxdiagRoad
; > diagGLRxdiagOneWayRoad
; > diagGLRxdiagRail
; > diagGLRxdiagAvenue
;

; > GLRxdiagAvenue
;
;
;diagonals
